column4: hi, when i run grub-instal from the live cd, (being root of my ubuntu hard install) it does not actually rewrite the grub. when i go to menu.lst, it still shows ubuntu and my previous distro on it. i would like to reinstall grub in such a way that it rewrites menu.lst to reflect the new distro i installed alongside ubuntu...is this possible?
install ubuntu using the alternative setup CD, that may help :)
are you saying that i need to reinstall ubuntu to fix this?
no wait sorry i misunderstood what you were saying, you want to install another distro along side ubuntu?
